description: The rugged and manly military muscle-jock Sergeant Miles is no stranger to the King of All Muscle Daddies, Tomas Brand. He and Tomas have had a lot of fun in the past, and that continues in this gay sex encounter. This team-up is easily one of the best on Lucas Entertainment to date: Sergeant and Tomas both have strong alpha personalities, as they demonstrate by spit roasting the throat and ass of Yuri Orlov. Yuri quickly proves he’s willing to do anything to be a good boy for his two daddies!
title: Sergeant Miles And Tomas Brand Share Yuri Orlov’s Boy Hole
